snippet: Penn State’s board of trustees will meet this weekend to consider whether to ratify a consent decree with the N.C.A.A. that imposed penalties for how the university handled the Jerry Sandusky child molesting scandal.
lead_paragraph: Penn State’s board of trustees will meet this weekend to consider whether to ratify a consent decree with the N.C.A.A. that imposed penalties for how the university handled the Jerry Sandusky child molesting scandal.

headline.main: Penn State Board to Discuss Penalties
headline.print_headline: Penn State Board to Discuss Penalties
